channel.title: New server help
channel.description:
right i now how to compile and i have jdk (just about all of them) but it still wont let me complie i dont no if it is very easy to fix or not but this is the error:
you need to have java files for this compiler to compile
and i dont get that cus theres loads of java files there so if u can , help me plz :).
oh yer im using satans isle source

wot do i do with it? put it in notepad then do i go on add in winrar and add it were my old compiler was?

item.title: New server help
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

OK this is one that i use

[code] CLS
@COLOR 04
@Title Demonscape
@ECHO Demonscape V3
@ECHO By rshadow
@ECHO ----
@ECHO Copyrighted 2006-2007
@ECHO ----
@ECHO Type 1 Then Enter To RunServer.
@ECHO Type 2 Then Enter To Compile.
@ECHO Type 3 Then Enter To Restart Server.
@ECHO Type 4 Then Enter To Restart+Compile.
@ECHO Type 5 Then Enter To Exit.
@SET option=
@ECHO off
SET /p option=What Do You Choose?
if %option%==1 goto runclient
if %option%==2 goto compile
if %option%==3 goto restartserver
if %option%==4 goto randc
if %option%==5 goto exit
:compile
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Demonscape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 3!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!rshadow!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
title Demonscape Compiler
javac *.java
pause
CLS
goto info
:runclient
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Demonscape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 3!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!rshadow!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
title Demonscape v3
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
goto info
:restartserver
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Demonscape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 3!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!rshadow!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
tskill java /a
@echo Exiting Other RunServer And Restarting…
title Knightscape V3
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
CLS
goto info
:randc
CLS
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Welcome To The!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Demonscape!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Compile!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!Version 3!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo !-!-!rshadow!-!-!
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo -----------------------------------------
@echo off
COLOR 04
tskill java /a
@echo Exiting Other RunServer And Compiling…
title WhoGivesAScape
“G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“G:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause

CLS
goto info

[/code]

Try that

Read full topic
